category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 2 (Compliance with the Olympic Charter, etc.)
contents: Article 2 (Compliance with the Olympic Charter, etc.) ① As the National Olympic Committee, the Sports Council complies with the Olympic Charter and guarantees compliance with the Olympic Charter in Korea. ② In case of conflict between the Sports Council’s Articles of Incorporation and the Olympic Charter, the Olympic Charter takes precedence. do. Revised March 13, 2019, ③ The Sports Council must maintain its autonomy and must not yield to any pressure, including political, legal, religious, or economic pressure, that may impede compliance with the Olympic Charter. ④ The Sports Council complies with the International Convention Against Doping in Sport ratified by the government of the Republic of Korea on February 5, 2007, the World Anti-Doping Code in accordance with the Olympic Charter, and the Olympic Games to prevent match-fixing. Complies with the Olympic Movement Code on the Prevention of Manipulation of Competitions and the anti-doping regulations adopted by the Korea Anti-Doping Commission. Revised March 16, 2021, November 11, 2022, ⑤ The Sports Council rejects any kind of discrimination or violence in sports.
